QuestData.Title: You Tell Him ...Hic!
QuestData.Description: Here'sh the deal. I'm not going to the captain with thish news. I'm an amateur alchemist, thish ishn't my job, and I'm on break!$B$BBeshides, he'sh a big grumpkin... and you know him better than I do!$B$BSho, jusht go up into the keep and tell him. I'm sure he'll be reashonable about the whole thing ...hic.$B$B<Peppy turns back to her drinking.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Peppy Wrongnozzle has suckered you into giving the bad news about the Forsaken plague to Captain Adams. Visit him at Westguard Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, $n, what is it now?$B$BWHAT?!! A Forsaken super plague that melts you in no time?$B$BYou oozed my vrykul prisoner?$B$B<The captain looks almost sad and spits in disgust.>$B$BAlright, I know what we need to do. Or rather, what YOU need to do!
